description:
Sickly daughter of http://anidb.net/ch17304 [Professor Hayashi]. Her mother passed away when she was young, and father decided to make toys to keep her company. These toys eventually evolved in complexity to become robots like http://anidb.net/ch7827 [Tama].
Already frail to begin with, she complied with her father`s request to conduct experiments on her to extract her personality data, which only hastened her death.
name: Hayashi Fuyou
